Html:
Hi!

Is there anybody out there who knows how to:

1. create an "open" polygon (i.e. not having a closing line segment on a polygon)
2. set the "FillMode" to none for a polygon
3. center the polygon on a specified lat/long

Many, many thanks in advance!
copy current function and modify for your needs

I'd love to do that but we're in a *very* tight timeframe here so I'd like to put in a minimum of work right now. I only want to have a marker "plotted" as a series of line segments with no fill. That's it! Nothing fancy. I have a collection of PointLatLng that I'd like to plot as a GMapMarker and I'm very close with the "RegeneratePloygonShape" but I need to plot the resulting polygon centered based on the generated polygon path with no filling...

Many Thanks!
be kind to share some code if you have a moment ;} maybe other people will need it too....
Kodo... how do you resolved center a polygon in screen?
try find min/max point of the polygon and use middle of it
